post.summary: Generate a short public link for dispute resolution
post.description:
Creates a short public link that allows sharing dispute information.
The link is only valid if the purchase has:
- A feedback entry (feedback created)
- A publication entry (feedback published)

The link will expire after the specified duration (in seconds).
Requires write:api permission.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Duration in seconds for which the link should be valid

parameters.name: purchase
parameters.description: The UUID of the purchase to create a link for

url.description: Full URL for accessing the dispute resolution page

400.description: Invalid request or purchase not eligible

404.description: Purchase not found or not owned by user

get.description:
Retrieves complete dispute resolution information for a valid short link.
This endpoint requires no authentication and provides:
- Purchase details (order number, date, amount, screenshot)
- Feedback details (creation date, content)
- Publication details (publication date, screenshot)
- Refund details if the purchase was refunded (amount, transaction ID)

The link must be valid (code format correct and not expired).

No permission required - public endpoint accessible with valid link code.

orderNumber.description: The order number for the purchase

feedbackText.description: The feedback text provided by the tester

publicationDate.description: Date when the feedback was published

isRefunded.description: Whether the purchase has been refunded

refundAmount.description: Amount refunded (only if isRefunded is true)

refundTransactionId.description: Transaction ID of the refund (if available)

delete.description:
Removes all expired short links from the database.
This endpoint is typically called as a maintenance task to clean up
links that have passed their expiration date.

Requires admin:api permission.

deletedCount.description: Number of expired links that were deleted
